## About

I am a **PhD candidate in Political Science** at the University of Colorado Boulder. I study how online extremist ecosystems translate into offline harm using computational methods, policy engagement, and collaborative field work.

- Consulting scholar for the House Select Committee on January 6th
- Deputy Director, Center on Terrorism, Extremism & Counterterrorism
- PI or co-PI on $1.38M in federally funded research
- Trusted research partner for major tech platforms and civil society groups
